author: xavier

text: Fun theme from an average sports game by Square-Enix for the Wii. Interestingly, this was composed by Masayoshi Soken who recently got his first major project with Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn. Might he become one of SE's main composers? We'll see, but judging from his work so far, he's very talented.
author: SupraDarky

text: Never got a chance to play this game, but the music is very light and airy﻿

text: Indeed, his work with A Realm Reborn was phenomenal.  Looking forward to more from him, for sure!
